name: Saint.Ethanbaron.V.Nusjuro
text: If you have 7 or more cards in your trash, this Character cannot be removed from the field by your opponent's effects and gains Rush. When Attacking: If you have 10 or more cards in your trash, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -2000 power during this turn.

effect.text: If you have 7 or more cards in your trash, this Character cannot be removed from the field by your opponent's effects and gains Rush.
If you have 10 or more cards in your trash, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -2000 power during this turn.
